registration-part-1-title: Art of Allyship Part 1 – Discovering our capabilities
registration-part-1-decription: In this 2 CPE virtual learning experience you will learn how Deloitte defines allyship, the capability model, what allyship is and is not.  You will also learn your responsibility to be an active ally regardless of level.
registration-part-1-button: Register for Art of Allyship part 1
registration-part-2-description: Through the power of human-centered storytelling, this 2 CPE virtual learning experience will challenge your thinking and provide ample opportunity to hone your allyship skillset.
registration-part-2-note: Register for Art of Allyship part 1
registration-part-2-button: Register for Art of Allyship part 2
registration-model-intro: Deloitte’s allyship capability model was designed to help you discover what it means to be an active ally.
registration-model-intro-continued: Continue scrolling to learn more about each capability by building your own custom learning experience.
